message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $120. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you the product for $160. What do you think?

Hi Alice, thanks for the counteroffer! I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $160. Would you be willing to meet me at $140? I'm really interested in the product, but I want to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence! I'm willing to meet you at $155, but I'm still not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer, so if you're interested, let me know now!
